T02D3165:183a-1: tree lokya ba shyam ka ra lo ki shva ra s'a dha nam /
T02D3165:183a-3: 'jig rten dbang phyug 'jig rten gsum dbang du mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D3165:183a-4: re zhig dang por yid kyi rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su rnal 'byor pas thang ka brkam la /
T02D3165:183a-5: de'i mdun du sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gur
T02D3165:183a-6: gum gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mdzes par bya ba'o
T02D3165:183b-0: aom rdo rje ri mo h'um dza: h'um bam @183b padma la bzhugs ho: //
T02D3165:183b-2: aom 'jig rten gsum dbang du mdzad pa rdo rje'i me tog h'um bzhes su gsol sv'a h'a /
T02D3165:183b-3: sngags 'dis mandala gyi dbus su 'jig rten gsum dbang
T02D3165:183b-4: du mdzad pa'i rje btsun 'jig rten dbang phyug mchod
T02D3165:183b-5: par bya ba'o // aom thub pa rdo rje mu: 'di ni gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags yin no //
T02D3165:183b-6: phyi nas ni rang gi snying gar yi ge aam bsam par bya ba'o //
T02D3165:183b-7: de yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor grub par bya'o //
T02D3165:183b-8: de'i steng du chags pa'i sa bon skya rengs dang po'i 'od zer dang mtshungs par bltas la /
T02D3165:183b-9: 'od zer de dag gis kyang snang ba mtha' yas
T02D3165:183b-10: mchod cing sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa yang
T02D3165:183b-11: byas la / slar yang lus la legs par gzhug par bya'o //
T02D3165:183b-12: de dag thams cad yongs su gyur pa las skad
T02D3165:183b-13: cig gis sa gsum gyi lug gnyis zhags pas sbrel
T02D3165:183b-14: ba'i thog gi padma'i steng du rdo rje'i skyil mo
T02D3165:183b-16: spyan gsum rnam par phye ba ral pa dang cod
T02D3165:183b-17: pan dang ldan pa rdo rje kha dog dmar pos
T02D3165:183b-18: mtshon pa'i zhags pa dang lcags kyu bsnams pa'o //
T02D3165:183b-19: sprul pa sna tshogs pa mnga' ba'i rdo rje rnal
T02D3165:183b-20: 'byor ma rnams la dbang bskur bar gsol ba gdab
T02D3165:183b-21: pa'o // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sna
T02D3165:183b-22: tshogs pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa rnams kyis mchod par
T02D3165:183b-23: pa'o // byed do // rig pa 'dzin pa dang
T02D3165:183b-24: khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug dang tshangs pa dang rnal
T02D3165:183b-25: 'byor ma'i tshogs rnams kyis kyang gar dang rol mo'i
T02D3165:183b-26: sgra byed cing sna tshogs pa'i 'byung po'i tshogs la
T02D3165:183b-27: sogs pa rnams dang mi mgo'i thod pa'i phreng ba
T02D3165:183b-28: sna tshogs pas brgyan pa rnams kyis kyang ngo //
T02D3165:183b-29: de bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i gdugs dang rnga yab la sogs pa yang blta bar bya ba'o //
T02D3165:183b-30: de dag dmigs la dam tshig tu de bzhin gshegs
T02D3165:183b-31: pa snang ba mtha' yas mgo bo la blta bar
T02D3165:183b-32: bya'o // 'di lta bu dag tu bdag nyid bsam par bya ba'o ;
T02D3165:183b-33: / de nas lte ba'i ltag tu nyi ma'i dkyil
T02D3165:183b-34: 'khor 'od zer gyi rang bzhin dang ldan par bsams
T02D3165:183b-35: la / de'i steng gi g-yon du chags pa'i sa bon no //
T02D3165:183b-36: snying gar khro bo'i sa bon no //
T02D3165:183b-37: dbyangs yig a'a: 'di rnams ni bsgom par bya ba'i sngags so //
T02D3165:184a-0: de dag thams cad bsgoms shing @184a * //
T02D3165:184a-1: rdo rje'i bdag nyid kyi sngags brjod pas rdo rje'i bdag nyid du bsam par bya ste /
T02D3165:184a-2: aom stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi bag nyid ni nga'o //
T02D3165:184a-3: rdo rje'i bdag nyid kyi sngags so //
T02D3165:184a-4: de dag goms par gyur pa'i sbyor bas g-yo ba dang bskyod pa dang /
T02D3165:184a-5: dbab pa byas la gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bskyod par bya ba'o //
T02D3165:184a-6: rnal 'byor pa de glang po bzhin du grag par
T02D3165:184a-7: 'gyur zhing shin tu dga' ba bzhin du rigs lnga
T02D3165:184a-9: gal te rigs lnga 'du bar ma gyur na /
T02D3165:184a-10: de'i tshe de'i lus la g-yo ba dang bskyed pa
T02D3165:184a-11: dang dbab pa la sogs pa gnas pa ma yin
T02D3165:184a-12: no ; / de ltar nyin re bzhin rigs lnga
T02D3165:184a-13: 'du ba des ni 'grub par 'gyur ba yin la
T02D3165:184a-14: no ; / grub pa thob pas kyang gzhan gyi lus g-yo ba dang /
T02D3165:184a-15: bskyod pa dang gab pa byas la /
T02D3165:184a-16: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa dgag par bya ste /
T02D3165:184a-17: dper na grub pa'i gser 'gyur gyis phug pa'i zangs ni mdog ngan pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3165:184a-18: de bzhin du lus nyid kyang 'bigs byed kyi bcud
T02D3165:184a-19: can gyis phug pas 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la
T02D3165:184a-20: sogs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3165:184a-23: aom hr'i a'a: gnod sbyin dbang phyug ma 'phrog ma sv'a h'a /
T02D3165:184a-25: aom a'am krom hra'i dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang
T02D3165:184a-26: phyug ma'i tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa ma lus pa
T02D3165:184a-27: rnams aa aa aa ba ta ra aa ba ta
T02D3165:184a-28: ra phyogs bcu nas gshegs su gsol zhing 'jig rten
T02D3165:184a-29: dbang ba yang gtor ma 'di grihna grihna h'um sv'a
T02D3165:184a-31: sa ra ha'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa /
T02D3165:184a-32: ao di ya nas rnam par phyung ba 'jig rten gsum dbang du mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs so //
T02D3165:184a-33: mkhas pa ratna a'a ka ra dang /
